ModMetaData.name: Caravans Rest Before Arrival
ModMetaData.author: 1trickPonyta
ModMetaData.description:
Instead of entering a map with near-empty rest and food bars, caravans will now automatically stop and rest just before entering a map until its members' needs are sufficiently met.
You can configure what "sufficiently met" means. Toggling off the caravan's rest button once activated will allow it to proceed as normal.
